definitions.definition: To send a message to; to transmit a message to, e.g. as text via a cell phone.
examples: I messaged her about the concert.

definitions.definition: To send (something) as a message; usually refers to electronic messaging.
examples: She messaged me the information yesterday.
Please message the final report by fax.

definitions.definition: To send a message or messages; to be capable of sending messages.
examples: We've implemented a new messaging service.
The runaway computer program was messaging non-stop.

main_definition: To send a message to; to transmit a message to, e.g. as text via a cell phone.
secondary_definitions: To send (something) as a message; usually refers to electronic messaging.
( intransitive ) To send a message or messages; to be capable of sending messages.
( obsolete ) To bear as a message.
